artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: startled man at right holding a cane in his PL hand and carrying a pack on his back by a strap over his shoulders; skeleton wearing a cape and a hat approaching man from left; text at top and bottom: "EL DOCTOR / IMPROVISADO / CUENTO / EDITOR / A. VANEGAS ARROYO. MEXICO."
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: El Doctor Improvisado (The Quack Doctor), plate 9 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
